blogs.title: Understanding React Hooks
blogs.author: John Doe
blogs.content: React Hooks are a new addition in React 16.8 that lets you use state and other React features without writing a class.

comments.author: Jane Smith
comments.content: Great article! I learned a lot about hooks.

blogs.title: Getting Started with TypeScript
blogs.author: Alice Johnson
blogs.content: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

comments.author: Bob Brown
comments.content: This is a very informative post. Thanks for sharing!
